resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

worklogs.comment:
github-actions[bot] commented on PR #14005:
URL: https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/14005#issuecomment-1231860792

   :warning: Ticket **has not been started in JIRA**, please click 'Start Progress'.

kou commented on code in PR #14005:
URL: https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/14005#discussion_r958910990


##########
cpp/cmake_modules/ThirdpartyToolchain.cmake:
##########
@@ -2245,7 +2245,7 @@ endif()
 if(ARROW_USE_XSIMD)
   resolve_dependency(xsimd
                      REQUIRED_VERSION
-                     "8.1.0"
+                     "9.0.0"

Review Comment:
   @cyb70289 Should we drop support for xsimd 8.1.0? Or is it OK that we support xsimd 8.1.0 or later?

cyb70289 commented on code in PR #14005:
URL: https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/14005#discussion_r959094585


##########
cpp/cmake_modules/ThirdpartyToolchain.cmake:
##########
@@ -2245,7 +2245,7 @@ endif()
 if(ARROW_USE_XSIMD)
   resolve_dependency(xsimd
                      REQUIRED_VERSION
-                     "8.1.0"
+                     "9.0.0"

Review Comment:
   I think we can drop support for xsimd 8.1.0. It's okay to only support the latest version.

kou commented on code in PR #14005:
URL: https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/14005#discussion_r959102516


##########
cpp/cmake_modules/ThirdpartyToolchain.cmake:
##########
@@ -2245,7 +2245,7 @@ endif()
 if(ARROW_USE_XSIMD)
   resolve_dependency(xsimd
                      REQUIRED_VERSION
-                     "8.1.0"
+                     "9.0.0"

Review Comment:
   OK. Thanks for sharing your opinion.
   
   If our xsimd 8.1.0 related maintenance cost isn't high, I want to keep xsimd 8.1.0 support because some packaging systems doesn't provide xsimd 9.0.0 yet. e.g.:
   
   * Debian: https://packages.debian.org/search?keywords=xsimd
   * Conan: https://conan.io/center/xsimd
   
   Is xsimd 8.1.0 support troublesome for us? It seems that the current our code base can work with xsimd 8.1.0 and 9.0.0.

cyb70289 commented on code in PR #14005:
URL: https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/14005#discussion_r959106016


##########
cpp/cmake_modules/ThirdpartyToolchain.cmake:
##########
@@ -2245,7 +2245,7 @@ endif()
 if(ARROW_USE_XSIMD)
   resolve_dependency(xsimd
                      REQUIRED_VERSION
-                     "8.1.0"
+                     "9.0.0"

Review Comment:
   Ah, then it's better to keep supporting xsimd 8.1.0. There's no trouble for us.

kou commented on code in PR #14005:
URL: https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/14005#discussion_r959117741


##########
cpp/cmake_modules/ThirdpartyToolchain.cmake:
##########
@@ -2245,7 +2245,7 @@ endif()
 if(ARROW_USE_XSIMD)
   resolve_dependency(xsimd
                      REQUIRED_VERSION
-                     "8.1.0"
+                     "9.0.0"

Review Comment:
   Thanks!

kou commented on code in PR #14005:
URL: https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/14005#discussion_r959117905


##########
ci/conan/all/conanfile.py:
##########
@@ -340,7 +340,7 @@ def requirements(self):
         if tools.Version(self.version) >= "6.0.0" and \
             self.options.get_safe("simd_level") != None or \
             self.options.get_safe("runtime_simd_level") != None:
-            self.requires("xsimd/8.1.0")
+            self.requires("xsimd/9.0.0")

Review Comment:
   Could you revert this because Conan doesn't provide 9.0.0 yet?
   https://conan.io/center/xsimd



##########
cpp/cmake_modules/ThirdpartyToolchain.cmake:
##########
@@ -2245,7 +2245,7 @@ endif()
 if(ARROW_USE_XSIMD)
   resolve_dependency(xsimd
                      REQUIRED_VERSION
-                     "8.1.0"
+                     "9.0.0"

Review Comment:
   @serge-sans-paille Could you revert this change to support xsimd 8.1.0 too.

issuetype.description: An improvement or enhancement to an existing feature or task.

fields.description: xsmd has released a new upstream version (namely 9.0.0), it would be nice to match it

comments.body: cc [~yibocai]. But [~serge sans paille], feel free to submit a PR as well.
Hi! I tried to push the update of xsimd to vcpkg and noticed that with the change arrow is failing to build: https://github.com/microsoft/vcpkg/pull/26501. Good to see that this is being worked on.
